title: Troubleshoot Failing Custom API Script
description: A customer reports that a custom API script provided by Professional Services has stopped working.

tasks.description: Get the error logs from the customer's execution of the script.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant obtains the stack trace, which shows a 'field not found' error.

tasks.description: Check the product's recent release notes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant finds that a recent product update renamed the API field the script was using.

tasks.description: Update the script with the new field name and provide the corrected version to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant provides a timely fix for the breaking change.
